name: Vi5-1on
description:
So what’s Vision about? - Vision is a horror game about being visually impaired. The playable character is an unnamed protagonist overcoming their fear of blindness. The game is a simulation taking place in a V-R environment, designed to help the character overcome and adapt to their blindness, and improve their spatial awareness. When a player touches an object, such as a wall or a table, the surrounding area will remain visible for a time or until the player moves away a certain distance from the object.

This is the demo of the mechanics in this game, and how they can be used. So don't take this too seriously XD
